txt.en: Authi can be found in Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should speak with Authi.
Roving Threat: Krabakam, the Master Hunter
Beasts of various origins have been causing problems for the dwarves in the Misty Mountains, including Krabakam, an expert hunter from the North who seeks only the most difficult game.
Krabakam can be found somewhere in The Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should defeat Krabakam.

'I am not a hunter. If it weren't for my companions, I'd starve to death on these slopes.

'I saw a strange fellow when last I was out. Either he did not notice me or he was looking for something. He is a Gauradan and a hunter from the North. I am worried that the next time I venture onto the slopes, he may hunt me!

'Will you drive this Gauradan away so that I may continue my exploration of the Misty Mountains?'

'That Gauradan hunter from the North made me wonder of what else survives in these frozen wastes. As an explorer, I may have another expedition lined up after this one. Thank you for providing a safe route for those who travel through the Misty Mountains.'
